_header: Heart be true and do not amiss
_description: Remember me — three lines, possibly part of a song

CamTCC1157.Transcription:
Harte be tru and don not a mysand thynk one them that gaue you
                    thisand euer among remember me
CamTCC1157.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “Middle English Lyrics: Handlist of New Texts.” 
             Anglia
         83 (1965): 35-47:  46 (not ‘12’ as in Robbins  and  Cutler (1965)
XRossell Hope Robbins,   and  John L. Cutler.  
             Supplement to the Index of Middle English Verse.
         Lexington, Kentucky: University of Kentucky Press, 1965).
